title: BrightData Web Fetcher
description: Search Google, research topics in-depth, or fetch web content. Three modes: 'search' for quick results, 'research' for comprehensive analysis, 'fetch' for direct URLs.

userSettings.name: serpApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData SERP API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for Google search requests.

userSettings.name: serpZone
userSettings.label: SERP Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for SERP API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: unlockerApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData Web Unlocker API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for bypassing website protections when fetching webpages. Required for research and fetch actions.

userSettings.name: unlockerZone
userSettings.label: Web Unlocker Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for Web Unlocker API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: openaiApiKey
userSettings.label: OpenAI API Key
userSettings.description: Your OpenAI API key for content extraction and analysis. Required for research action.

openaiSpec.name: brightdata_web_fetcher
openaiSpec.description: Search Google, research topics, or fetch content. INTENT-BASED ACTIONS: 'search' for finding/discovering (fast, headlines only). 'research' for deep analysis (reads full content). 'fetch' for specific URLs. TARGETING: When country/language mentioned, use appropriate gl/hl codes and translate queries.

action.description: 'search': Quick discovery - returns headlines/snippets only (use for 'find X', 'get latest Y', 'show me Z'). 'research': Deep analysis - fetches and reads full content (use for 'research X', 'analyze Y', 'compare A vs B'). 'fetch': Direct URL content extraction.

query.description: Search query or array of up to 5 different search queries in target language. For search action: use multiple strategic queries to find what you need. For research action: single focused query. Use optimized keywords for target market, not literal translations.

context_question.description: Original user question in English for relevance filtering (research action only).

gl.description: Country targeting. When country mentioned: Japanese‚Üíjp, German‚Üíde, French‚Üífr, etc. Defaults to 'us'.

hl.description: Language targeting. When language mentioned: Japanese‚Üíja, German‚Üíde, French‚Üífr, etc. Defaults to 'en'.

url.description: URL or array of URLs for 'fetch' action.
